briefdescription.para: blurFigure blurs and prevents interaction on a figure window

detaileddescription.para:
Syntax
hFigBlur = blurFigure(hFig, state) Description
blurFigure(hFig) blurs figure hFig and prevents interaction with it. The only interaction possible is with user-created controls on the blurring panel (see below). hFigBlur = blurFigure(hFig) returns the overlaid blurred figure pane. This is useful to present a progress bar or other GUI controls, for user interaction during the blur phase.
blurFigure(hFig,STATE) sets the blur status of figure hFig to STATE, where state is on,off,true or false (default=on/true).

blurFigure(hFig,on) or blurFigure(hFig,true) is the same as
blurFigure(hFig). blurFigure(hFig,off) or blurFigure(hFig,false) is the same as
close(hFigBlur). blurFigure(demo) displays a simple demo of the blurring
hFig - (default=gcf) Handle(s) of the modified figure(s). If component handle(s) is/are specified, then the containing figure(s) will be inferred and used.
state - (default=on/true) blurring flag: on,off,true or false

Examples
blur hFig (alternative #1) blur hFig (alternative #2) un-blur hFig (alternative #1) un-blur hFig (alternative #2) un-blur hFig (alternative #3) un-blur hFig (alternative #4)
blur demo with progress bar etc.
add a blur with a cancel button uicontrol(parent,hFigBlur, string,Cancel, Callback,close(gcbf));

simplesect.title: Bugs and suggestions
simplesect.para: Please send to Yair Altman (altmany at gmail dot com)

simplesect.title: Warning
simplesect.para: This code heavily relies on undocumented and unsupported Matlab functionality. It works on Matlab 7.9 (R2009b) and higher, but use at your own risk!

simplesect.title: Change log
simplesect.para: A27420 2011-03-08: Minor fix to the demo 2011-10-14: Fix for R2011b
enableDisableFig, setFigTransparency, getJFrame (all of them on the File Exchange)
